name: Silex templates
body:
### Silex templates

We invite you to use these templates for your projects.

They can be edited with [Silex, live web creation](http://www.silex.me), the HTML editor and website builder for designers. 

##Preview the templates

* [Minimal Grey](/silex-templates/templates/minimal-grey/)
* [about me page](/templates/lexoyo.github.io/)

##How to customize it for your website?

Download the [zip file on github](http://silexlabs.github.io/silex-templates/) and unzip to a folder in your dropbox. Then [open Silex in a browser](http://www.silex.me/silex) and with it, open the template file ```editable.html``` from the ```/templates/``` folder.

Then insert your content, modify the design and use it for your website.

##How to contribute

These templates are made without programming, just drag and drop, with [Silex, live web creation](http://www.silex.me/). So feel free to fork this github repository, make changes and make a pull request.

##Creative Commons license

These templates are licensed under a **Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License**. Anyone who pushes design and HTML files in this repository agrees to this license.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
